mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT('表结构不一致 tbName:',tb_name,' 期望字段:',exp_columns,' 数据库中字段:',db_columns) as msg FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*)= 6 as fg,'wechat_user' as tb_name,group_concat(COLUMN_NAME) db_columns, 'ID,USER_ID,PIC,NAME,OPEN_ID,UNION_ID' exp_columns FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'wechat_user' AND COLUMN_NAME in('ID','USER_ID','PIC','NAME','OPEN_ID','UNION_ID') GROUP BY TABLE_NAME UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*)= 7 as fg,'users' as tb_name,group_concat(COLUMN_NAME) db_columns, 'ID,PHONE,USER_PWD,REAL_NAME,USER_NAME,GENDER,STATUS' exp_columns FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'users' AND COLUMN_NAME in('ID','PHONE','USER_PWD','REAL_NAME','USER_NAME','GENDER','STATUS') GROUP BY TABLE_NAME UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*)= 2 as fg,'card' as tb_name,group_concat(COLUMN_NAME) db_columns, 'ID,ID_CARD' exp_columns FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'card' AND COLUMN_NAME in('ID','ID_CARD') GROUP BY TABLE_NAME )a WHERE fg=0
